name: web-texture-tool
description: Utility to efficiently handle loading of a wide variety of texture formats

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build-min && npm run build-basis && npm run build-ktx
scripts.build-basis: copyfiles --flat src/basis/basis_transcoder.* build/basis && npx esbuild --bundle src/basis/basis-worker.js --target=es6 --outdir=build/basis --minify --sourcemap --format=esm
scripts.build-ktx: copyfiles --flat src/ktx/msc_transcoder_wrapper.* build/ktx && npx esbuild --bundle src/ktx/ktx-worker.js --target=es6 --outdir=build/ktx --minify --sourcemap --format=esm
